scripts.test-a11y: npm run build && lerna run test-a11y
scripts.test-a11y:canary: npm run build:canary && lerna run test-a11y --scope=@ukic/canary-web-components --stream
scripts.build: lerna run build --scope=@ukic/web-components --scope=@ukic/fonts --scope=@ukic/docs --stream  && lerna run build --scope=@ukic/react --stream && lerna run build --scope=@ukic/nextjs --stream
scripts.build:canary: lerna run build --scope=@ukic/canary-web-components --stream  && lerna run build --scope=@ukic/canary-react --stream
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:canary
scripts.test-visual:all: npm run test-visual && npm run test-visual:canary
scripts.test-visual:ci:all: npm run test-visual:ci && npm run test-visual:ci:canary
scripts.test-visual: npm run build && npm run build-storybook:web-components && lerna run test-visual --scope @ukic/web-components --stream
scripts.test-visual:canary: npm run build:canary && npm run build-storybook:canary-web-components && lerna run test-visual --scope  @ukic/canary-web-components --stream
scripts.test-visual:ci: npm run build && npm run build-storybook:web-components && lerna run test-visual:ci --stream
scripts.test-visual:ci:canary: npm run build:all && npm run build-storybook:canary-web-components && lerna run test-visual:ci:canary --stream
scripts.test-visual:update-ci: npm run build && lerna run test-visual:update --scope=@ukic/web-components --stream
scripts.test-visual:update-ci:canary: npm run build:all && lerna run test-visual:update:canary --stream
scripts.test-cypress:ci: npm run build && npm run test-cypress:headless
scripts.test-cypress:ci:canary: npm run build:all && npm run test-cypress:canary:headless
scripts.test-cypress:ci:all: npm run build:all && npm run test-cypress:headless && npm run test-cypress:canary:headless
scripts.audit: npm run audit-expiry && audit-ci -m --config audit-ci.json && lerna run audit
scripts.static-analysis: npm run lint && npm run prettier && npm run audit
